data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Omelko, Mikhail M. (2014): Reconsideration of Xysticus species described by Ehrenfried Schenkel from Mongolia and China in 1963 (Araneae: Thomisidae). Zootaxa 3861 (3): 275-289, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.3.5
